name: Endless Freeride
description:
Description

Drop in and shred down the mountain while getting some air and performing tricks all while trying to line up for a perfect landing in this snowboarding version of a casual infinite-runner.

Controls

Left Joystick = Move Direction / Hold Down to Slow.

Right Joystick = Spin Direction

Jump = Hold down on the Right Joystick and then flick up on it.

Tips

  • The player should time their jump to release at the top of ramps to achieve maximum distance. 
  • When the player times their jump properly, they will be given a bit of air control (Left Joystick) so you can adjust your position and line up for a rail while in air. 
  • If you do not jump at the top of a ramp, you will not go nearly as far and you are unable to control the position of the player while in the air.
  • You don't always need to go as fast as possible! In fact, it may be better to shed some speed and align yourself properly for some jumps/rails.

Extras

Built-in average FPS counter that you can toggle off/on for your convenience.

Source Files:  https://github.com/Kfollen93/Endless-Freeride
